SecurityInventoryNameDescription: Checks if the antivirus is enabled and up to date.
Checks if root certificates can be installed by users.
Checks if there are expired certificates installed.
Checks if automatic certificate updating is enabled.
Checks when the certificates were last synchronized.
Checks if there are unknown certificates installed within the trusted root certificate store.
Checks if there are expired certificates installed within the CurrentUser store.
Checks if there are unknown certificates installed within the CurrentUser store.
Checks if the firewall is enabled.
Checks if there are open firewall ports and returns the list of open ports.
Checks if the User Account Control is enabled.
Checks if the Local Administrator Password Solution is enabled.
Checks if Windows Hello is enabled and what factors are available.
Checks if the local user is a member of the local Administrators group.
Checks if Windows Hello is enabled and if the local user has enrolled factors.
Checks if VBA is disabled in MS Office.
Checks whether SMBv1 is enabled.
Checks whether SMB signing is enabled.
Checks whether NetBIOS is enabled.
Checks whether WINS is enabled.
Checks whether only secure protocols are used
Checks whether only secure protocols are used
Checks if PowerShell V2 is enabled
Checks if PowerShell remoting is enabled
Checks if PowerShell Common Language Mode is enabled
Checks and evaluates the PowerShell Execution Policy
Checks if PowerShell Logging is enabled
Checks and evaluates the PowerShell Execution Policy
Checks whether services are running in uncommon locations
Checks whether services use service.dll in uncommon locations
Checks if Bitlocker is enabled on the system.
Checks if COM is hijacked.
Checks if the time provider is hijacked.
Checks if HTA execution is enabled for the current user.
